course

Class Activity

  • java.lang.Object
    • course.Activity
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Conflict
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    Course

    public abstract class Activity
extends java.lang.Object
implements Conflict
    Abstract super class that represents a single Activity and has getters and setters for title, meeting days, start time, and end time. Also has abstract methods to provide information to the GUI and to check whether or not an Activity is a duplicate.
    Author:
    Selena Chen, Travis Walter, Tyler Mathis
